OFFER_TESTIMONIALS_TESTIMONIAL_0: The best company I've become a customer at ever, everything is super simple and they have a fantastic customer service. Strongly recommended!

ONBOARDING_DOWNLOAD_PARAGRAPH_2: Record your claim, chat with our service team, and get unlimited help every day until 10 p.m.
CHECKOUT_CREDIT_CHECK_INFO_HEADER: We perform credit checks on all new customers
CHECKOUT_CREDIT_CHECK_INFO_CONTENT: Customers with a record of non-payment pay in advance in some cases. If this applies to you, you will be notified by contacting us.
CHECKOUT_SIGN_FAIL_MANUAL_REVIEW: Unfortunately, we can't offer you to purchase an insurance online. Please contact [betaling@hedvig.com](mailto:betaling@hedvig.com) and we'll assist you.
OFFER_BUNDLE_SELECTOR_DESCRIPTION: All insurances cover you and your co-insured. You can upgrade or downgrade your bundle or change your start date in the Hedvig-app.
OFFER_APP_PROMOTION_HEADING: An insurance-app that solves all your problems
OFFER_APP_PROMOTION_PARAGRAPH: Make a claim, manage your insurances or ask questions. With the app you’ll have full control over your insurances and get instant help if something has happened.
STARTPAGE_UNINSURED_BODY_WITHOUT_ACCIDEN: Get a price quote on our home insurance and the new complementary accident insurance.
ACCIDENT_SWEDEN_UPSELL_DESCRIPTION: Covers accidents, injuries outside your home, hospital stays, dental injuries, scarring plus much more. The insurance applies to all co-insured. No deductible.
SIDEBAR_ADD_CAMPAIGN_BODY: Got a discount code? Input it below.

CHECKOUT_SIGN_FAIL_ERROR_TEXT: Please try again or contact us in the chat or email us at [hedvig@hedvig.com](mailto:hedvig@hedvig.com) if the problem remains.
SIDEBAR_REQUEST_CANCELLATION_INSURANCE_N: We will gladly help you cancel your current {INSURANCE_NAME} for you. Your new insurance with Hedvig will be activated when your old expires. You’ll receive more info via email.
CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_DETAILS_DESCRIPTION: Your payment is withdrawn from your credit card at the end of each month. We handle all payments securely with Adyen.
CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_DETAILS_TERMS: By clicking "Complete purchase" I confirm that I have read and understood the terms and conditions, and that I approve that Hedvig handles my personal information.

CHECKOUT_CONTACT_INFO_CREDIT_CHECK_HELPE: We credit assess all new customers. Those who have payment remarks will in some cases be asked to pay in advance.

LANDING_PAGE_MISSING_MAIN_COVERAGE_ERROR: At least one option must be selected to continue
LANDING_PAGE_MULTI_MAIN_COVERAGE_SUBHEAD: Choose at least one main coverage and any additional coverage you’d like to get started. In the next step, we’ll ask you some follow-up questions.
OFFER_BUNDLE_SELECTOR_DESCRIPTION_CAR: It's easy to switch coverage in our app. Cancel at any time.
OFFER_APP_PROMOTION_HEADING_CAR: Change your coverage in the app
OFFER_APP_PROMOTION_PARAGRAPH_CAR: Hedvig is a convenient alternative for those who don’t want to devote more time than necessary to their insurance. No phone queues, no paperwork, just quick help right in the app. Record your claim, talk to support, update your payment method, and so on — wherever you are.
OFFER_SWITCH_PROMOTION_PARAGRAPH_CAR: Is your car insured with another provider? No problem. To switch, start by taking out a car insurance with Hedvig, setting the renewal date of your existing policy as the start date. Then connect a payment method and cancel your existing policy. Your Hedvig car insurance will come into the effect on the day that your previous policy expires.
LANDING_PAGE_SUBHEADER_NO_ADDITIONAL_COV: Pick an insurance policy below to get a personalized quote. Trouble choosing? No worries — you can always add more protection or change your details later in our app.
MAIN_COVERAGE_DESC_CAR: A safe, easy-to-use insurance with all the protection you and your car need.
ONBOARDING_CONFIRMATION_PARAGRAPH_1: Since you're already a member it's just to log in to the app to access everything related to your new insurance.
ONBOARDING_CONFIRMATION_PARAGRAPH_2: You can chat with your service team and get unlimited assistance till 10 PM, just as usual.
SIDEBAR_START_DATE_INFO_TEXT: Already insured? Set your current policy’s expiry date as the start date. If you don’t know the expiry date, you can pick an approximate date and change it later in our app.
OFFER_PAGE_MISSING_MAIN_COVERAGE_ERROR: At least one main coverage must be selected to continue
SIDEBAR_SWITCHING_NOTICE_BODY: After signing up for Hedvig, simply follow the link we email you and authorize the switch using BankID.
DOWNLOAD_PAGE_CAR_SWITCHER_HEADING: How to cancel your previous insurance
DOWNLOAD_PAGE_CAR_SWITCHER_BODY: Simply click the link you’ll have in your inbox shortly and follow the instructions. Questions? Chat with us in the app, and we’ll be happy to help.
INITIATE_CAR_CANCELLATION_PAGE_TITLE: Cancel your old car insurance | Hedvig
CAR_SWITCHER_TOO_SOON_BODY:
Since your previous insurance seem to expire quite soon, you’ll need to contact the insurer yourself to cancel it. Don’t worry, it’s easy.

1. Sign an insurance with Hedvig
2. Contact your previous insurer and let them know you want to cancel your insurance
3. Done, your new insurance with Hedvig activates on your selected date.
LANDING_PAGE_UPDATE_CHOICES_SUBHEADING: You can always update your choices later.
OFFER_SWITCH_PROMOTION_PARAGRAPH_CAR_V2:
We noted that your car is already insured with another company. Don’t worry – switching is quick and easy. Here’s how it works:

1. Sign a car insurance with Hedvig. 
2. Receive an email with a link that lets you authorize the switch, using mobile BankID.
3. We’ll contact your precious insurer and cancel the policy on your behalf.
4. All done! Your new car insurance with Hedvig is automatically activated on the day your previous one expires. 

Please note: if your previous insurance expires within 1 week, you’ll need to contact the insurer yourself to cancel it.
SIDEBAR_SWITCHING_NOTICE_ADDENDUM: If the expiry date is within a week, you’ll be asked to contact your insurer yourself to cancel it.
SIDEBAR_STARTDATE_CELL_LABEL_SWITCHER: Start date (expiry of your old insurance)
AFTER_SIGN_PAYMENT_MESSAGE: Welcome to Hedvig! Just one more thing to do before relaxing; connect direct debit for your monthly payments.
